name: Game24
tagline: A demonstration of building Common Lisp webapps with lazy-bone
body:
Months ago one of my friends from Econ Dept suggests creating a stats webapp for his PhD cohorts. We both love the idea but sadly, I know nothing about javascript. This disappointed me until I came across [ParenScript](http://common-lisp.net/project/parenscript/) by chance. 


```lisp
(defun a ()
nil)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
